page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is very little employment in the area itself. Most people work outside in{Worcester, Pershore, Evesham}or even{Birmingham.}Those that work within the area do so mainly at home (housewives etc.). The main D block employers are{Midland Shire Farmers {Depot,}providing farm supplies. {R.S.R.E.}employs{100}people but none are local. The{Primary school}at {Defford}employs a few local people as does the{Special school}at{Besford}but many of the staff also live on the premises. Local farmers employ a number of people but some of this work is seasonal. Once it is in full operation it is hoped that the {Conference Centre and Restaurant}at {Crome Court}will increase employment opportunities in the area.
